thread.title: This Video Of Men Doing Yoga In Kilts Is Taking Over The Internet
thread.title_full: This Video Of Men Doing Yoga In Kilts Is Taking Over The Internet

author: Patrick Lejtenyi
title: This Video Of Men Doing Yoga In Kilts Is Taking Over The Internet
text:
Shares Long Story Short 
A video of two Scottish men doing yoga in the woods wearing nothing but kilts, hose and ghillie brogues has taken over the Internet, and it isn’t difficult to figure out why. Quick Take 
Okay, so who wants to watch two super-buff, tattooed bearded dudes do yoga in the Scottish wilderness? Other than like your mom, your girlfriend and most other women on planet Earth? 
The proof is in the blood pudding: the BBC’s The Social filmed Dundee yoga instructor Finlay Wilson and Tristan Cameron-Harpe twisting away in super slo-mo in the bucolic settings of rural Scotland, with thumpy drums adding to the sheer primal loin-heating animal impulse of it all. 
Why exactly they felt the need to film these two dudes looking like much more perfect human specimens while they wear next to nothing is totally baffling, but the video has been viewed on the Social’s Facebook page more than 20 million times. 
The Social is meant to showcase “comedy, lifestyle & more from fresh talent in Scotland.” In this case it also showcases a couple of Scottish rear ends and what may be the hint of a Scottish testicle, so you've been warned. Own The Conversation 
These dudes can’t be as perfect as they seem, right? Drop This Fact 
Consider this: Finlay Wilson is also famous because he adopted a stray dog he met while on vacation in Sri Lanka. Show comments
